alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 8:05AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Sevenmile Creek At Blackman Road -Nashville affecting Davidson County. For the Mill Creek...including Blackman Road - Nashville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Sevenmile Creek At Blackman Road - Nashville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 6.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM CST.
